comments.body: I'm sorry to say but these comments do not add any information. Is this common in the "fix golint errors" series of PR?

I referred the other comments.
e.g.
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/de5ec3a2ed44c08d46542ec94bb98d8e117342ee/pkg/controller/daemon/daemon_controller.go#L132-L133
https://github.com/kubernetes/kubernetes/blob/de5ec3a2ed44c08d46542ec94bb98d8e117342ee/pkg/controller/deployment/deployment_controller.go#L100-L101
